title: BRING BACK PREMADES IN 3v3 !!!!
body:
**BRING BACK PREMADES IN 3v3 !!!!**


This que has single handedly went into the gutter thanks to Gehirn 's great decision to remove premades in ranks of D5 and higher , Which means  not only are the players you're matched with REALLY bad , but they're also beyond toxic and refuse to play the meta .


It's not right for players to be completely gimped into  playing solo in a flex mode which was designed to be a team based mode to begin with.


This change has only done the following to the que

-Force high elo players ( Master-chals ) to play decay games and hop smurfs
-Force diamond players into playing 1 game every 4 weeks
-Encourage high elo players to vs low elo players 
-Encourage COMPLETE NEWBIES to participate in diamond + games when they have no business being there to begin with .


I'm sick to death of casual players rocking up into TT and not knowing how anything works when im in diamond and losing 20-30 lp for it and only gaining 12 or so back ??????


THIS ISNT FUN  IN THE SLIGHTEST 

You ask someone if they can play support and they're like 

"No F*CK that cheese strats boring " 

It's legit meta ... Having a jungler is sub optimal in this mode and it's only the casuals that don't realise this , whats worse is when you're diamond you're forced to wait 3-20 minutes and still getting unranked - chal players because the ques trash anyway !! , why can't we premade with players that want to win to and actually take this mode seriously ?


You know whats the best part though ... Vsing 3 man premades when you're forced to solo and have 2 monkeys that are unranked -gold on your team doing happy laps and inting on the map  ^_^


Do the ENTIRE 3v3 population a huge favor and revert that horrible decision you made so we can actually play our game , also **bring back the que on Thursdays and Fridays too **, People have lives and most of the time they go out on the weekends causing the que health to go down even more.


To the bronze and silvers about to flame in the thread ...  on behalf of diamond + players we don't want to play with you either :)

replies.body: Remove support meta first. You diamonds are nothing without it.

> [{quoted}](name=BearGrillz34,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=HMEwJEkM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-11T09:46:32.609+0000)
>
> Remove support meta first. You diamonds are nothing without it.



I mean it's how the modes meant to be played ...  diamond + 's can't stand playing " Jungle " because it's bad.

Oh really? So is that why everyone I know quit TT?  Like from 50 people who used to play TT, only 4 remained. Their reason: Support meta ruins it.

Seriously, maybe you guys enjoy it but we don't.Not everyone likes meta, we aren't all meta monkies. You guys may like competition, but we like entertainment and enjoyment.  It ruins it for the people who want to play the game properly (before those stupid support items were introduced). Say what you like, but It's just stupid. I seriously think TT needs another rework to fit with the new group of champs & items. As it stands, I quit the mode cause of that stupid **** meta. It's so boring, dull and  ruins the game mode.

> [{quoted}](name=BearGrillz34,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=HMEwJEkM,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-06-11T15:56:53.442+0000)

> Oh really? So is that why everyone I know quit TT?  Like from 50 people who used to play TT, only 4 remained. Their reason: Support meta ruins it.
> 
> Seriously, maybe you guys enjoy it but we don't.Not everyone likes meta, we aren't all meta monkies. You guys may like competition, but we like entertainment and enjoyment.  It ruins it for the people who want to play the game properly (before those stupid support items were introduced). Say what you like, but It's just stupid. I seriously think TT needs another rework to fit with the new group of champs & items. As it stands, I quit the mode cause of that stupid **** meta. It's so boring, dull and  ruins the game mode.



Have you tried aram ? heard there isn't a meta there 


I'm glad a gold player that doesn't play meta can pitch their 2 cents in though , we  definitely need your input on an issue only diamond + players are facing .


Talks about playing the game "properly " and doesn't play meta {{champion:48}}  , If you want to play the game properly play the meta .


a gold player left the mode because he can't play meta ... oh that's unlucky man {{champion:44}}  Must be the maps fault  lets rework it !

Yes but the issue here is that if you're allowed to queue up as a 3 man, we end up vsing you. This is not a good experience for us. 

Exactly, I am a gold player who doesn't enjoy the meta, you are a diamond player who does. This does not mix well.

Say what you like, shit's boring as hell and you know it. I'd be fine if they let you queue up, only if WE don't get paired with you guys!

Before this change, I was vsing a ton of challenger/diamond 1 TT players and it just isn't fun to play against. 

3 man premade dia+ TT players vs me & 2 randoms who haven't played the game mode before. 

As it stands, TT is dead to me. Diamond is like 10% of the whole queue's population anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=BearGrillz34,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=HMEwJEkM,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-14T07:35:56.091+0000)
>
> Yes but the issue here is that if you're allowed to queue up as a 3 man, we end up vsing you. This is not a good experience for us. 
> 
> Exactly, I am a gold player who doesn't enjoy the meta, you are a diamond player who does. This does not mix well.
> 
> Say what you like, shit's boring as hell and you know it. I'd be fine if they let you queue up, only if WE don't get paired with you guys!
> 
> Before this change, I was vsing a ton of challenger/diamond 1 TT players and it just isn't fun to play against. 
> 
> 3 man premade dia+ TT players vs me & 2 randoms who haven't played the game mode before. 
> 
> As it stands, TT is dead to me. Diamond is like 10% of the whole queue's population anyway.

We don't want to be matched against you guys either , we literally sit in que times of up to an hour and 20 minutes then get thrown into your if we 3man as diamond + , Is it really fair on the diamond + players to lose lp because some casual players get into the que and are like hey im gonna play jungle ...when you try explain to them that jungle isn't optimal they throw a pissy fit and say something along the lines of " i don't care it's flex 3's nobody cares about this que im playing for fun "

If you want to avoid diamond + players you're better off having us wait in q for an hour then us quing and being matched against you solo anyway , we basically get the same lp regardless playing solo or premade and lose a tonne more because of a coinflip .. whoever has the newer player loses  .... It's too hard for people to play morg bot max w with a materializer and not int ... they'd rather play yasuo or camille and afk shove endlessly and die over and over .

This ALWAYS happens too , it's not like a 1 off thing either


Playing meta isn't boring  , you're literally out rotating the other team  thinking of ways you can starve the enemies gold supply, with jungle it's literally clear 3 camps hey look i don't have camps for x amount of time lets go pay bot a visit .. oh that didn't work ? my camps are still down lets try gank them again ... 


Why should players under diamond only be able to premade ? , If we're being 100% honest NOBODY is playing anymore since Gehirn killed the mode.

All the diamonds are playing 1 game a month , all the masters and chals are playing decays and we're all logging smurfs from bronze - plat and ruining  your lives anyway with little to no  que wait either ... 

The diamond player shouldn't be forced to play non meta, just because someone who's gold feels they don't want to ... Do that in summoners rift and you get banned ( points to support singed with smite )

Diamond + is ALL of the ques population , anyone else is a casual player that plays 1-10 games and leaves , 9/10 the people you see in bronze - plat playing meta are the diamond +'s on smurfs.

this que's literally dead to everyone who enjoyed it , cherry ontop we only get to play it on weekends ...???? Because people don't have things like lives to live on a weekend

if your sick of losing just win LOOOOOOOOOOL {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:13}} {{summoner:1}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
